column4: Ooh, Lambchop. How old is that sock? If I had a sock on my hand for thirty years it'd be talking too.

column4: Hey. Where's Joey?

column4: Joey ate my last stick of gum, so I killed him. Do you think that was wrong?

column1: Rachel: I think he's across the hall.
column4: I think he's across the hall.

column4: There y'go.

column4: Hey Pheebs, you gonna have the rest of that Pop-Tart?.. Pheebs?

column4: Does anyone want the rest of this Pop-Tart?

column4: Sorry. ..Y'know, those stupid soda people gave me seven thousand dollars for the thumb.

column1: All: You're kidding. Oh my God.

column4: And on my way over here, I stepped in gum. ...What is up with the universe?!

column1: Joey: What's going on?
column4: What's going on?

column4: Nothing. I just think it's nice when we're all here together.

column4: Even nicer when everyone gets to wear their underwear..

column1: Rachel: Uh, Joey..
column4: Uh, Joey..

column4: Oh, God!

column1: Monica: Okay..
column4: Okay..

column4: Oh! That was Lambchop!

column1: Monica: Please, guys, we have to talk.
column4: Please, guys, we have to talk.

column1: Phoebe: Wait, wait, I'm getting a deja vu...no, I'm not.
column4: Wait, wait, I'm getting a deja vu...no, I'm not.

column4: Alright, we have to talk.

column1: Phoebe: There it is!
column4: There it is!

column1: Monica: Okay. It's-it's about Alan. There's something that you should know. I mean, there's really no easy way to say this.. uh.. I've decided to break up with Alan.
column4: Okay. It's-it's about Alan. There's something that you should know. I mean, there's really no easy way to say this.. uh.. I've decided to break up with Alan.

column1: Ross: Is there somebody else?
column4: Is there somebody else?

column1: Monica: No, nononono.. it's just.. things change. People change.
column4: No, nononono.. it's just.. things change. People change.

column1: Rachel: We didn't change..
column4: We didn't change..

column1: Joey: So that's it? It's over? Just like that?
column4: So that's it? It's over? Just like that?

column1: Phoebe: You know.. you let your guard down, you start to really care about someone, and I just- I-
column4: You know.. you let your guard down, you start to really care about someone, and I just- I-

column1: Monica: Look, I- I could go on pretending-
column4: Look, I- I could go on pretending-

column1: Joey: Okay!
column4: Okay!

column1: Monica: -but that wouldn't be fair to me, it wouldn't be fair to Alan- It wouldn't be fair to you!
column4: -but that wouldn't be fair to me, it wouldn't be fair to Alan- It wouldn't be fair to you!

column1: Ross: Who-who wants fair? Y'know, I just want things back. Y'know, the way they were.
column4: Who-who wants fair? Y'know, I just want things back. Y'know, the way they were.

column1: Monica: I'm sorry..
column4: I'm sorry..

column1: Chandler: Oh, she's sorry! I feel better!
column4: Oh, she's sorry! I feel better!

column1: Rachel: I just can't believe this! I mean, with the holidays coming up- I wanted him to meet my family-
column4: I just can't believe this! I mean, with the holidays coming up- I wanted him to meet my family-

column1: Monica: I'll meet somone else. There'll be other Alans.
column4: I'll meet somone else. There'll be other Alans.

column1: All: Oh, yeah! Right!
column4: Oh, yeah! Right!

column4: Are you guys gonna be okay?

column4: Hey hey, we'll be fine. We're just gonna need a little time.

column1: Alan: Wow.
column4: Wow.

column4: I'm, I'm really sorry.

column4: Yeah, I'm sorry too. But, I gotta tell you, I am a little relieved.

column1: Monica: Relieved?
column4: Relieved?

column1: Alan: Yeah, well, I had a great time with you.. I just can't stand your friends.
column4: Yeah, well, I had a great time with you.. I just can't stand your friends.

column4: Remember when we went to Central Park and rented boats?.. That was fun.

column4: Yeah. He could row like a viking.

column4: Mmm.

column4: So how'd it go?

column1: Monica: Oh, y'know..
column4: Oh, y'know..

column4: Did he mention us?

column4: He said he's really gonna miss you guys.

column4: You had a rough day, huh.. c'mere.

column4: I don't care, I don't care! Game's over! I'm weak! I've gotta smoke! I've gotta have the smoke!
